name: Media and the World of Work
description: The course explores the relationships between journalism and the labour movement in Canada's present media environment. It examines how labour is perceived as a media issue and how labour stories are framed in mainstream media - what is reported, how it is reported, what isn't reported, and why. It also examines significant issues in Canadian labour history within a media studies context.Same as JOUC62H3
prerequisites: ACMB01H3 and [[MDSA01H3 and MDSB05H3] or [JOUA01H3 and JOUA02H3]]
